column4: How do I fix a grub 17 error (I tried google, and nothing has worked so far)
fresh kubuntu install; 2 80GB HDD (/dev/sd{a,b}); sda=1Linux partition; sdb=1Linux partiton,1Swap (boot drive, sda is storage)
I think I am using a new(er) version of grub, and the system is looking for an older version
